about.title: Information
about.author: This program is a macro editing and management program for MORSEKEY-A01 devices developed by Airmodeling.
about.description: A Windows application that provides JSON-based simple macro editing and preview functionality.
about.usage_text: After editing is complete, connect the MORSEKEY-A01 to boot mode and upload the macro.json file to the device's file path to apply.

key_info.description:
SYNS     : Morse code language setting switch
MACRO    : Auto sentence input switch
AT-S     : Auto space input switch
Dot·Dash simultaneous input : Enter key input

morse_info.title: Morse Code Pattern
morse_info.description: Uppercase and lowercase letters are distinguished according to CAPS LOCK status.

upload_info.title: MACRO Upload Method
upload_info.description:
1. Press the reset button.
2. After pressing reset, press KEY-1 and KEY-3 simultaneously.
3. After a moment, it will automatically connect to edit mode in Windows.
4. After uploading the MACRO file, press the reset button to apply the changes.
